scripts.start:dev: export DEBUG=http,wss,stock,watch NODE_ENV=development && node index.js | pino-colada
scripts.build-css: export NODE_ENV=production && rm -f public/*.css && node_modules/node-sass/bin/node-sass -C --trace --sourcemap=none resources/assets/styles/global.sass --stdout | node_modules/clean-css-cli/bin/cleancss --inline all | node_modules/hashmark/bin/hashmark -l 8 'public/app-{hash}.css' --silent
scripts.build-js:dev: export NODE_ENV=development && rm -f public/*.js && node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js resources/assets/scripts/index.js -t sheetify -g unassertify | node_modules/hashmark/bin/hashmark -l 8 'public/app-{hash}.js' --silent
scripts.build-js: export NODE_ENV=production && rm -f public/*.js && node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js -t sheetify -g [ loose-envify --NODE_ENV production ] -g unassertify -g browserify-nodent -g [ bubleify --yes dangerousTaggedTemplateString --objectAssign='xtend' ] -g uglifyify resources/assets/scripts/index.js | node_modules/hashmark/bin/hashmark -l 8 'public/app-{hash}.min.js' --silent
scripts.inject-js: sed -i -e '/<!-- custom:js -->/!b;n;c\    <script defer src="/static/'$(basename public/app-*.js)'"></script>' resources/views/index.html
scripts.inject-css: sed -i -e '/<!-- custom:css -->/!b;n;c\    <link rel="stylesheet" href="/static/'$(basename public/app-*.css)'">' resources/views/index.html
